long_description: Using your smarthphone in cold weather doesn't have to mean freezing your fingers. Pull on the REI Tech-Compatible Thermo mittens and enjoy warm hands and the ability to operate a touch-screen device. Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) polyester fleece blocks wind up to 8 mph and continues to insulate when damp; has good water repellency to shed light snow showers. Tech-compatible leather palm patches extend up thumbs and work with touch-screen smartphones; durable palms also provide excellent grip. REI Tech-Compatible Thermo mittens have a trim profile that maintains dexterity.
short_description: Using your smarthphone in cold weather doesn't have to mean freezing your fingers. Pull on the REI Tech-Compatible Thermo mittens and enjoy warm hands and the ability to operate a touch-screen device.
